text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You should just call this your daily bitch session. You’re not really giving Coronavirus updates. That’s done by the other experts there.   BTW, the argument regarding China or Iran as far as whether it’s believable is irrelevant. Our problem is here. Not in China.
